metadata.Title: CVE-2022-48063 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: GNU Binutils before 2.40 was discovered to contain an excessive memory consumption vulnerability via the function load_separate_debug_files at dwarf2.c. The attacker could supply a crafted ELF file and cause a DNS attack.

notes.Note: seth-arnold> binutils isn't safe for untrusted inputs.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
